title: @RiotLyte and @RiotOthers; Perma-chat restrict ROUND THREE (I KNEW it)
body:
http://i.imgur.com/c3frPFe.jpg
I called it. I KNEW RIOT WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO CONTROL THEMSELVES.
This is the third time that I am chat restricted that has led to me making this thread , except this time there were a few games in between. It was meant to lull me into a false sense of security so I would stop updating the last thread, but I will not, they were wrong. I will continue dauntlessly.

Why the fiddle sticks does Riot have it in for me anyway?



Edit:
To clarify; I do not claim to be innocent, only that the punishment is disproportionately harsh for my crime. Permanent chat restriction is far too severe for what I have committed.
